summary.event: ICITS'26 - 9th International Conference on Information Technology & Systems
summary.location: Universidad Tecnológica de Honduras, Roatán Island, Honduras
summary.invitation: We invite you to submit original papers.

English.format: Lecture Notes in Networks and Systems series
English.previous_publication: must not have been published before
English.author_identification: must not include any information leading to authors’ identification

Spanish_or_Portuguese.format: RISTI - Revista Ibérica de Sistemas e Tecnologias de Informação
Spanish_or_Portuguese.previous_publication: must not have been published before
Spanish_or_Portuguese.author_identification: must not include any information leading to authors’ identification

summary.review_process: All papers will undergo a double-blind review by at least two members of the Scientific Committee.
